about_the_game:
Drunkle Ted's Wet and Reckless is here!

After his place of employment G4tv shut down Drunkle was locked away in storage. But was it something more sinister than mismanagement?
Someone or something is hot on Drunkle's tail!
You must guide Drunkle to the end of each level before running out of booze. You must avoid being caught by enemies!

Each level has side challenges for Drunkle Ted to complete before the timer runs out.

"Scores" are points earned by Drunkle defeating enemies, collecting items, and exploring the environment.

"D-R-U-N-K" letters are hidden throughout

legal_notice: This is a free game. This is fan art for Drunkle Ted
name: Drunkle Ted's Wet and Reckless Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7300U 3.5 GHz, AMD Ryzen 3 3300U, or equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960, AMD R9 280, or equivalent DX11 GPU
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Play as Drunkle Ted. He was locked in storage after G4tv studio shut down. Help him escape while avoiding the deep state and the lizard people! Guide him to each level end while earning points and side objectives, such as Find the SpaceJam DVDs!
